critters.name: White-tailed Deer
critters.summary: Common woodland browser often seen around feeders.

critters.name: Raccoon
critters.summary: Nocturnal snack inspector with clever paws.

critters.name: Eastern Gray Squirrel
critters.summary: Fast tree runner and expert seed thief.

critters.name: American Red Squirrel
critters.summary: Small, bold, and loud about its territory.

critters.name: Virginia Opossum
critters.summary: Slow mover that cruises after dark for food.

critters.name: Eastern Cottontail
critters.summary: Edge-of-woods grazer with quick escape hops.

critters.name: Striped Skunk
critters.summary: Night forager with a famous defense plan.

critters.name: Blue Jay
critters.summary: Bold feeder visitor that announces everything.

critters.name: Northern Cardinal
critters.summary: Bright songbird often seen near brushy edges.
